ubs-client-profile.message-if-edit: Please fill in your profile to make the ordering process as fast and convenient as possible
ubs-client-profile.name: Name
ubs-client-profile.delete-message: If you delete your profile, your bonuses will burn out and your order information will be deleted without the possibility of recovery

cancel-modal.question: If you cancel, the changes will be lost. Do you really want to cancel the changes?

go-back-modal.question: If you go back, the changes will be lost. Do you really want to cancel the changes?
